problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,点M为CD的中点,且DC=2AD,则AM与BM的夹角的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, point M is the midpoint of CD, and DC = 2AD, then the degree of the angle between AM and BM is ()
raw_answer: 解:▱ABCD,∴DC∥AB,AD∥BC,∴∠DAB+∠CBA=180°,∠BAM=∠DMA,∵点M为CD的中点,且DC=2AD,∴DM=AD,∴∠DMA=∠DAM,∴∠DAM=∠BAM,同理∠ABM=∠CBM,即:∠MAB+∠MBA=\frac{1}{2}×180°=90°,∴∠AMB=180°-90°=90°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质,三角形内角和定理,等腰三角形的性质等知识点,综合运用知识进行证明是解此题的关键．
